title: Comparative analysis of genetic variants in pleural fluids and solid tissue biopsies of pleural mesothelioma patients: Implications for molecular heterogeneity assessment
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Roberto Silvestri, Filomena Rea, Marianna Vitiello, Gabriele Moretti, Vittorio Aprile, Marco Lucchi, Paolo Aretini, Chiara Maria Mazzanti, Stefano Landi, Federica Gemignani
